name: kids horses lovers - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:
In this game your child will direct a rocket. To win it is necessary to collect a maximum point going as high as possible. For this, your child must avoid the obstacles and collect cans of fuel. In the two player mode the winner will be one who will climb as high as possible. When a level is successful a horse picture becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
This is a simplified curling game for children. To earn the maximum possible points, we must put the puck closest to the center. To win you must make a certain score in a limited time. When a level is successful a horse picture becomes available in the image gallery.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of horses.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of horses to release.

the following languages ​​are available:

Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
